I think I have just the thing for you! Have you considered "Disclosure" (1994)? It's a gripping suspense thriller that explores themes of power, harassment, and personal secrets, all set against the backdrop of a high-stakes corporate world. With Michael Douglas and Demi Moore leading an all-star cast, this film is sure to keep you on the edge of your seat.

Alternatively, if you're in the mood for something a bit more intense and action-packed, "Below Zero" (2011) might be right up your alley! This tense drama follows a police officer as he's taken hostage by ruthless con men after a botched transport goes horribly wrong. With its non-stop thrills and chilling tension, you won't want to look away from this one!
